questions.question: What is a standalone computer? (1-4)

choices.answer: A computer that is not connected to a network
A computer that is being used as a server
A computer that does not have any peripherals attached to it
A compute that is used by only one person

questions.question: Which os these is a characteristic of a LAN? (3-6)

choices.answer: It covers a wide geographical area
Computers are connected together using a leased line
Users can share files and peripherals
Data can only be transmitted at a very slow rate

questions.question: Which of these is a characteristic of a WAN? (3-6)

choices.answer: It covers a small geographical area
Normally has a lower bandwidth than a LAN
It is contained within one building
Users are not able to share files and peripherals

questions.question: Which of these statements is true? (3-6)

choices.answer: Client-server has a central computer that provides services
A client-server network is cheap and easy to set up
A client-server network cannot be used to share files
Computers on client-server networks ar maintained separately

questions.question: Where are you most likely to find a peer-to-peer network? (1-4)

choices.answer: In a large organisation
In a home
In a large office
Across several offices in a company

questions.question: Which of these is a benefit of a peer-to-peer network? (6-9)

choices.answer: Antivirus scans run across all computers from one computer
Software updates run across all computers from one computer
All computers can be maintained from one computer
Files and peripherals can be shared

questions.question: Which of these is the correct definition of a router? (1-4)

choices.answer: Forwards data packets along a network
Corrects errors that are found in data packets
Type of transmission media that provides the best speed
A server within a network

questions.question: Which transmission media is capable of having a much higher bandwidth? (6-9)

choices.answer: Coaxial
Twisted pair cable
Plastic
Fibre optic

questions.question: Which type of transmission media is the least expensive to manufacture? (6-9)

choices.answer: Coaxial
Twisted pair cable
Plastic
Fibre option

questions.question: Which component is internal to a computer and is required to connect it to a network? (1-4)

choices.answer: Wireless Access Point
Network Interface Card
Switch
Hub

questions.question: What is meant by latency in the performance of a network? (6-9)

choices.answer: The time data takes to travel from source to destination
The maximum rate that data can be transferred at
Number of errors found in a data packet after transmission
Route a data packet takes when it is being transmitted

questions.question: Which of these terms refers to the maximum rate at which data can be transferred? (1-4)

choices.answer: Error detection
Packet switching
Bandwidth
Transmission Media

questions.question: What is meant by a data packet? (6-9)

choices.answer: A unit of data travels along a network
Number of errors found in data when it has been transmitted
The data a computer needs to connect to a network
Connection point in a network that allows data to be shared

questions.question: What is meant by a virtual network? (3-6)

choices.answer: A network that is controlled by a central server
A network that is used only to share software
Controlling computers & devices remotely using the internet
Network that is built using only wireless connection points

questions.question: Which of these is a benefit of a virtual network? (6-9)

choices.answer: Higher level of security than other remote connections
No need for any hardware to connect a computer to a network
No need for any software to connect a computer to a network
Stop errors occuring in the transmission of data in network

questions.question: Which of these is a correct definition of DNS? (6-9)

choices.answer: An internet service that is used to detect errors
Internet service that stores data in large quantitites
Internet service that provides a messaging service
An internet service that translate names into IP address

questions.question: What is meant by hosting? (3-6)

choices.answer: Service that allows you make a website available on the web
Service that creates websites for companies
Service that transmits data in a network
Service that translates names into IP address

questions.question: What is cloud computing? (1-4)

choices.answer: Storing large amounts of data on a single computer
Using the internet for data and programs remotely
Storing hard copies of data as backup
Using the internet to communicate with other users

questions.question: What problem can occur through using cloud computing? (3-6)

choices.answer: Privacy and scurity issues
More hardware so a company can store data
Only a small amount of data can be stored
Only a small amount of software can be stored

questions.question: Which of these is a benefit of cloud computing? (3-6)

choices.answer: Less company costs - don't need to buy their own hardware
Cheapest option as cloud computing is free
Data can be accessed anywhere - even without internet
Data is always more secure in cloud computing
